characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If at the beginning of the controlling player's Shooting phase, any LORD OF CHANGE or DAEMON PRINCE is within 12" of Aetaos'rau'keres, roll a D6. On a result of 4+, the Staff of Cataclysm's ranged attack must be used against the closest LORD OF CHANGE or DAEMON PRINCE (friend or foe, contrary to the usual rules for selecting targets).
